sillies

last edit: 15 october 2025

for quite some time now i've had a little ritual of sending my boyfriend a silly little selfie, mostly of me making odd faces, the moment i leave the office for the day. so now i've got a huge collection of weird selfies that i think are fun to show off.

currently this site shows all of these selfies from 2025 so far. i might periodically update this, or not.
